title: Change notification reminder interval from 6 hours to 4 hours

requirements.text: In `frontend/public/sw.js`, change the repeating notification interval from every 6 hours (6 * 60 * 60 * 1000 ms) to every 4 hours (4 * 60 * 60 * 1000 ms). Update the setInterval call and any related comments or constants that reference the 6-hour schedule.

quotes: can you change the remind notification setting from every 6 hours to every 4 hours

acceptanceCriteria: The service worker `sw.js` uses a 4-hour interval (14,400,000 ms) for the repeating notification schedule instead of 6 hours.
No references to the old 6-hour interval remain in `sw.js`.
The notification still fires correctly when started, sending a reminder with a motivational quote.

constraints: Only change the notification interval value â€” do not alter notification content, service worker message handling, or any other logic.
Do not modify any immutable frontend paths.
nonGoals: Allowing users to customize their own notification interval.
Changing any backend logic or data models.
Modifying the Settings UI or notification toggle behavior.
